chessboard.pieces

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • chessboard.pieces.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class representing a generic chess piece. Will be implemented by specific peices.
